sentences.en: a modular course in business studies
sentences.cn: 商学专业的一个单元课程

sentences.en: Any chance of your modular UAVs is missing?
sentences.cn: 你们的无人航空器有可能遗失了 吗 ?

sentences.en: Flexible Modular Fixture: slot system, holes in two categories.
sentences.cn: 柔性组合夹具: 槽系 、 孔系两大类.

sentences.en: JAIMBot this modular architecture is used by AIM clients to provide services.
sentences.cn: JAIMBot这个模块化的体系结构用于通过AIM客户端来提供服务.

sentences.en: Master design thought of modular mechanical drive system was introduced.
sentences.cn: 介绍了模块化机械传动系统的总体设计思路.

sentences.en: Modular check design concept facilitates maintenance and assembly access.
sentences.cn: 模块化止回阀结构简化维护,有助于接近总成.

sentences.en: Modular design to make the corridors look larger than it actually was.
sentences.cn: 走廊采取可移动式模组化设计,这样可以用各种组合让场景感觉比实际上大.

sentences.en: Moreover, PCA is a special case of modular PCA.
sentences.cn: 此外, pca是 分块pca的特殊情况.

sentences.en: Most colleges now use the modular system of teaching.
sentences.cn: 大多数大学现在都使用模块化的教学体系。

sentences.en: Sequential Modular Approach was applied to design distillation column simulation training algorithm.
sentences.cn: 采用序贯模块法设计了精馏塔仿真培训的算法.

sentences.en: Specific modular units including tin - lead solder being used in special professional equipment.
sentences.cn: 特殊专业设备中包含铅锡焊料的特定组合单元.

sentences.en: The course is modular in structure.
sentences.cn: 该课程在结构上以单元划分。

sentences.en: The earliest automorphic functions to be studied were the elliptic modular functions.
sentences.cn: 研究得最早的自导函数是椭圆模函数.

sentences.en: The modular program concept meets individual user demands for specific project requirements.
sentences.cn: 模块程序结构允许依照特殊需要加入附加大家模块.

sentences.en: The moon vehicle system was based on a modular design.
sentences.cn: 月球车系统建立在模块设计的基础之上.

sentences.en: They ended up buying a prebuilt modular home on a two-acre lot.
sentences.cn: 最后他们购买了一幢建在两英亩土地上的预制组合式房屋。

sentences.en: This programmer is designed on a modular basis.
sentences.cn: 这程序器是在标准组件的基础上设计的.

phrases.tran_cn: 模块化系统；积木式系统

trans.tran_cn: 模的，（尤指英国大学里的课程 ）分单元的（由独立单元组成，学生可选修），（机器、建筑等）组合式的，模块化的
trans.tran_en: consisting of separate parts or units which can be put together to form something, often in different combinations
